{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:32.899

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:35.419

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:36.700

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:37.700
    | text      = It's what happens when you're in a prison and it's when you've had your common's time
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:41.899
    | text      = and you've been able to go outside in a minimum or medium security prison and the lockdown
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:47.500
    | text      = is when you're put back inside your jail cells for night lockdown, L O C K D O W N.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:54.220
    | text      = Wow.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:55.220
    | text      = And it goes down, down, down the confining of prisoners to their cells, typically after
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:01.820
    | text      = an escape or a regain control of a riot, a state of isolation or restricted access initiated

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:16.059
    | text      = The university is on lockdown and nobody has been able to leave cold martial law.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:24.539
    | text      = I like to have fun with definitions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:26.220

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:29.220
    | text      = the word lockdown.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:30.220
    | text      = The very specific one Alex is using about prison riots.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:33.659
    | text      = According to dictionary.com, another meaning for lockdown is a freeze or a pause.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:37.980
    | text      = The word can be used to describe a temporary state of affairs that requires a pausing of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:41.500
    | text      = normal activity.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:43.000
    | text      = Now what's even more fun is if we consult Merriam-Webster and find the definition from
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:46.379
    | text      = martial law, quote, the law administered by military forces that's invoked by a government
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:51.679
    | text      = in an emergency when the civilian law enforcement agencies are unable to maintain public order
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:55.940
    | text      = and safety.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:57.620
    | text      = According to encyclopedia Britannica, one of the most defining characteristics of martial
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:01.460
    | text      = law is the military takes over the administration of justice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:05.019
    | text      = And none of that stuff is happening at all right now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:07.940
    | text      = And if it were happening, the only person who could invoke it would be Trump.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:12.220
    | text      = This highlights an interesting problem with Alex's rhetoric.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:14.500
    | text      = I don't think he knows what martial law is, yet it's his primary fear and his branding.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:19.360
    | text      = He seems to think that martial law is just any kind of law he doesn't like or rules or
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:22.860
    | text      = guidelines that he finds inconvenient.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:24.860
    | text      = And that's not what martial law is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:26.860
    | text      = I think he just knows that the name of it is scary to people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:31.019
    | text      = And he's just going to yell about it all the time, not having any idea.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:34.779
    | text      = And also, I went down a long rabbit hole looking at the history of martial law.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:40.720
    | text      = And like two of the most important figures in terms of the early history of the definition
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:46.419
    | text      = of martial law were Thomas Jefferson and Andrew Jackson.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:51.580
    | text      = And Andrew Jackson enacted martial law on New Orleans and refused to lift it after the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:57.200
    | text      = imminent threat of an English invasion ended.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:00.580
    | text      = So like the people who Alex lionizes and admires are people who have a rocky history in terms
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:07.620
    | text      = of the definition of martial law becoming something that could apply to civilians.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:12.659
    | text      = Yeah, it makes perfect sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:13.980
    | text      = He doesn't know what he's talking about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:15.379
    | text      = Of course his cosmology includes blind hero worship of the people doing the exact same
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:21.539
    | text      = thing that he's been fighting against his entire life.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
